data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 295,790 believers in the state of Nyandarua.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nyandarua, Kenya
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Nyandarua
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Nyandarua, Kenya that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Nyandarua unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Nyandarua, Kenya.
Father, please raise up prophets in Nyandarua who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 295,790 believers in Nyandarua, Kenya a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Nyandarua
location.people_groups_list: Oromo, Sakuye, Gujarati Creole, Hindi, Somali, Arab, Hadrami
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Oromo, Sakuye (35,000), Gujarati Creole (2,100), Hindi (6,700), Somali (3,050,000), Arab, Hadrami (13,000)
